caption: This was one of my most favourite spots in all of Paris. Taking time out from the hectic city and simply sitting and watching the world go past.
Great fun for kids and adults alike.  Price is very reasonable for a half hour of sailing.  We will definitely return for another adventure.
Our kids really enjoyed it and the owner was very friendly. Good value for money in the centre of Paris
The best 5 Euro ever spent‚Äîour 6 year old loved it. No electronics‚Äîjust good old fashioned fun! We‚Äôve promised our 6y.o. to come back and do it again tomorrow!
Nice Guy, kids loved to sail the boats in the pond!
My 2 children absolutely loved sailing the boats, they worked together and it was a highlight of our vacation. Best fun for your Euro!
Loved this!  What a great mid city activity.
What a delightful surprise - to rent push sail boats. The person running this was kind, and it is actually great value and a lot of fun for the kids.
This was so much for my four year old son running around and pushing the sailboat with a stick.  So much better than the remote control sailboats in my opinion.
Wonderful experience and incredibly fun and enjoyable for a 170 years old activity whereby both adult and especially children are having a great time ‚õµ‚õµ‚õµ

A great place to spend some free time. Rafael, the designer of headrests that float on their own and do not sink, rents them for 5 Euro per 30 minutes. They are pushed away from the shore with a wooden stick l
Very nice place and for children the boats to ride are a real highlight and can only be recommended and the boat to rent for half an hour is not expensive either.
Magnificent Little Boats! Half an hour of play for very little money - we loved it! THANKS!
So simple and yet sooo cute! We can only recommend a wonderful and fun experience of sitting at the fountain and watching your boat!
The small boats brought joy to my two children who, despite the imminent closure of the service, were able to test the small boats. Thank you again!
Great time shared with the children, simple joy and good humor at the meeting! Hosted and organized by a nice sailor. Kenavo, good luck!

Great activity recommended by my daughter's Parisian grandmother, she loved it and asks me to go back. And what's more, it's not expensive compared to the ride which only lasts a few seconds.  The park is very pleasant and the man responsible for the small boats is very friendly!
Always fun for the kids. 5‚Ç¨ per 1/2 hour is really a nice price for Paris. 30 minutes is enough for a little one.

Always very pleasant, my son and his friend really loved it. The negative point which is not the least is that people sit with their feet on the pool and unfortunately the children cannot play properly. Thank you to the town hall for doing what is necessary

August 7, 2022 very unpleasant visit. Seller was horribly rude to us adults as well as the children. Like: you're not going to do that, you're not going to do this... like crazy.  I bring families of diplomats to visit states located in Paris. I was ashamed that they saw this kind of character. This degrades the image of Paris.
Very nice boss. To recommend.  Cheap and fun.
